titleStmt.title: Animadversions on the medicinal observations of the Heidelberg, Palatinate, Dorchester practitioner of physick, Mr. Frederick Loss by Alius Medicus.
titleStmt.author: Alius Medicus.
B. T., 17th cent.
Loss, Friedrich.

notesStmt.note: "Mr. Loss, his letter to Alius Medicus": p. [2]-[16] at end; "Alius Medicus his answer to Mr. Loss": p. [17]-[20] at end.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
